scriptmodule.description: Click and go to category at level 3 nested in level 1 and level 2 via position.
scriptmodule.codecomment: **Caution:** Mouse over is not needed due to scripts not beeing able to opeen this kind of implememntation of flyouts. Click still works on non-visible element.

command.name: mouseOver
command.comment: **Caution:** Mouse over is not needed due to scripts not beeing able to opeen this kind of implememntation of flyouts. Click still works on non-visible element.

command.name: clickAndWait
command.target: css=div#navigation nav ul.menu-category.level-1 li:nth-of-type(@{positionLevel1}) .level-2 ul.level-2 li:nth-of-type(@{positionLevel2}) .level-3 ul.level-3 li:nth-of-type(@{positionLevel3}) a
